Selim Thabet
+216 50 871 614 | thabetselim06@gmail.com | linkedin.com/in/selim | github.com/selim
Summary
Entrepreneurial and methodical Computer Science student with hands-on experience in full-stack development,
AI/ML, and cloud-based software. Skilled in TypeScript, React/Next.js, Python (Flask/Django), and Docker,
with proven ability to build scalable, user-centric platforms. Experienced in interdisciplinary projects across
healthcare, IoT, and automation, consistently delivering measurable performance improvements. Demonstrated
leadership as team lead in IEEE and startup projects, excelling in problem-solving, agile execution, and startup
environments. Seeking a 6-month end-of-studies internship (from Feb 2026) with the possibility of continuing
afterward.
Education
Higher Institute of Computer Science, University of Tunis el Manar Ariana, Tunisia
Bachelor in Computer Science Sep 2023 – June 2026
• Relevent Coursework:Data Structures and Algorithms(Python), Object Oriented Programming(JAVA)(OOP),
Software Development, Machine Learning, Operating systems, Web Engineering, Database systems, Cloud
Computing
Experience
IEEE Tunisia Section Jul 2025 – Aug 2025
Software Engineering Intern & Team Lead Tunis, Tunisia
• Designed and implemented an automation tool in Python used across IEEE branches, ensuring scalability and
maintainability
• Led a team of 4 developers in agile sprints, conducting code reviews and mentoring juniors
• Implemented core features in Python, integrating automation scripts for certificate generation
• Applied CI/CD pipelines to streamline testing and deployment, reducing release time by 40%
• Practiced agile methodologies (sprints, reviews, retrospectives) to deliver on time
• Documented processes and code for easy extensibility
Orange — Dialyhelp Startup Jul 2024 – Nov 2024
Software Engineering Intern Tunis, Tunisia
• Drove end-to-end development of a healthcare monitoring platform deployed on AWS/Linux with Docker
• Collaborated with cross-functional team to research and implement solutions for complex software problems,
including optimization of server performance and latency reduction in sensor data pipelines for dialysis patient
monitoring
• Built REST APIs (Node.js/TypeScript, PostgreSQL) and integrated them into a Next.js + D3.js frontend for
real-time dashboards
• Improved system performance and latency in IoT sensor data pipelines, applying optimization algorithms and
profiling tools
• Integrated Flask-based AI microservices for OCR-enhanced recognition, improving accuracy of noisy medical sensor
data
• Collaborated with designers and product managers, translating requirements into user-focused features
Projects
AI Form Automation Extension| JavaScript/Typescript, Python, Flask, PostgreSQL Mar 2024 – Present
• Engineered a real-time form autofill extension using DOM graph traversal algorithms and heuristic field detection
(labels, placeholders, names)
• Implemented hash-based deduplication and caching with invalidation via MutationObserver to optimize detection
in dynamic SPAs
• Designed a parallel autofill pipeline (profile vs. AI) with timeout/cancellation handling, reducing latency and
improving robustness
• Built a microservice AI backend for contextual suggestions, applying pattern matching and data normalization for
dates, selects, and text
• Optimized user experience with progress-tracking overlays and resilient recovery mechanisms, cutting average fill
time by 70%
AI Sign Language Translator| Python, Tensorflow, AWS, Docker, OpenCV, Mediapipe Mar 2024 – Sep 2024
• Designed and trained an LSTM-based sequence model for real-time gesture recognition, achieving ¿90% accuracy
on test splits
• Built scalable data pipelines with OpenCV and Mediapipe for training temporal sequence models
• Delivered low-latency translation with Dockerized microservices and AWS cloud deployment
Skills
Programming: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Java, C/C++, SQL, Dart
Frontend: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, HTML5/CSS3, D3.js, Figma (basic)
Backend: Node.js (Express), Django REST, Flask, FastAPI, REST APIs, WebSockets, Microservices
Systems & DevOps: Linux/Unix, Docker, AWS, CI/CD (GitHub Actions), Kubernetes (basics), Distributed Systems
Databases & Data: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Data Modeling, Data Visualization
Tools: Git/GitHub, GitLab, Swagger, Postman, UML
Languages: Arabic (Native), French (C2), English (C2), German (B1)
Soft Skills: Leadership, Problem-Solving, Product Thinking, Collaboration, Adaptability, Communication
